summary: Implement snipsync integration to automatically test code snippets in TypeScript SDK documentation, preventing them from breaking due to code changes.
userImpact: Users receive outdated or broken code examples in documentation, leading to confusion and failed implementation attempts.
proposedFix: Use snipsync tool to automatically test and synchronize code snippets in documentation with actual codebase changes.
resolutionDetails: Implemented snipsync integration for documentation code snippets to ensure they remain synchronized with codebase changes.
keyQuote: We have quite a few code snippets in the docs, they're bound to break due to code changes, snipsync should help us test our snippets.
